description: CLI app for querying local notes via Nia semantic search

subtasks.name: Update package.json with bin, scripts, and metadata
Implement nia-sync integration (src/lib/nia-sync.ts)
subtasks.notes: Read API key from ~/.nia-sync/config.json + run `nia once` for sync

subtasks.name: Implement init command (src/commands/init.ts)
subtasks.notes: Uses checkbox prompt for folder selection, reads API key from nia-sync

subtasks.name: Implement ask command (src/commands/ask.ts)
subtasks.notes: Includes --sync flag to run nia once before search

subtasks.name: Implement sync command (src/commands/sync.ts)
subtasks.notes: Runs `nia once` to trigger one-time sync

subtasks.name: Implement folders command with list/add/remove subcommands (src/commands/folders.ts)
subtasks.notes: list: show all folders, add: checkbox to add, remove: checkbox to remove

subtasks.name: Implement config command (src/commands/config.ts)
subtasks.notes: Shows config file path, API key source, and selected folders count. --reset flag to delete config

subtasks.name: Wire up all commands including folders subcommands and sync
Test build with bun build (verify shebang preserved)
subtasks.notes: Build successful - shebang preserved, file executable, CLI help works

subtasks.name: Manual testing of all commands
subtasks.notes: All commands tested: --help, --version, config, config --reset, init, sync, ask, folders, folders add, folders remove. Error handling verified for missing nia-sync config, missing vault config, and API failures.

notes: Prerequisite: Users must have nia-sync installed and configured
API key is read from ~/.nia-sync/config.json (not stored in vault config)
Vault config only stores selectedFolders array
Sync is optional: use 'vault sync' or 'vault ask --sync' flag
Sync runs `nia once` command (one-time sync, then exit)
folders command has subcommands: list (default), add, remove
Runtime: Compile to Node-compatible JS with #!/usr/bin/env node shebang (works with both Node and Bun)
